description: This header file defines the interface for the Slap Object Mapper (Omo) component in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the Omo object, which are likely used across different parts of the system.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjMapper
methods.description: Creates an instance of the SLAP Object Mapper, taking container, owner, and reserved handles as parameters.

methods.name: SlapOmoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Slap OMO object with given container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: SlapOmoRemove
methods.description: Removes or deallocates the Slap OMO object identified by the handle.

methods.name: SlapOmoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the Slap OMO to operate.
